item.title: generate random timestamps in mysql
item.description: Iâ€™m now try to prepare a mysql performance comparison between hdd and flash. So to create a lot of test data I needed a function to create random timestamps in a certain range. After trying google I gave up and started with the mysql documentation and came up with the following statement: select from_unixtime( unix_timestamp('2008-01-01 01:00:00')+floor(rand()*31536000) ); So lets break it it down a bit: first I set a start date (minimum for the random)
